name: GetWorkerTimezones
description:
Retrieve available worker time zone instances.

This tool fetches instances of time zones for workers, which can be used as values for other endpoint parameters in the Workday service. Call this tool to obtain a list of worker time zones.

parameters.name: effective_date
parameters.description: The effective date to look up time values for a given worker. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: The effective date to look up time values for a given worker.

parameters.name: response_object_limit
parameters.description: Sets the maximum number of objects in a response. Default and max is 1000.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default and maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: response_offset
parameters.description: The starting index for the response collection. Use with 'limit' to manage pagination. Default is 0.

value_schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

parameters.name: worker_id
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the worker to look up time values for.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the worker to look up time values for.
